DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare PFDI-20 questionnaire functional outcome laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy vaginal mesh surgery treatment symptomatic exteriorise cystocele 4 year surgery . The secondary objective study follow : 1. compare two technique anatomical result base clinical evaluation patient POP-Q . 2. overall quality life assessment expectation patient . 3. compare two technique long-term safety . The evaluation focus adverse effect long-term sexual genital symptom , urinary digestive functional symptom , chronic pelvic pain . 4. compare improvement functional outcome assess PFDI-20 questionnaire ( matched-analysis versus ) .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Laparoscopic Sacropexy Vaginal Mesh Surgery Women Cystocele Repair .
DOC.criteria: All patient include PROSPERE study include PROSPERE4 study .
